title: Hikkaduwa - Land For Sale
details:
126 Perch Beach front land for sale in Godagama, Hikkaduwa Rs. 1.68 Lakhs per perch

Rectangular shape leveled land facing to Galle road and beach,

Land side but facing to Galle/ Colombo main road with beach view ideal for tourism related work

Clean deeds acceptable by the banks for loans. No brokers / agents please. We only expect genuine buyers!

Price Negotiable. I am overseas at the movement and available in Sri Lanka from September 2018. Please send me an email with your contact details.
